title: Cranberry Salad
instructions: Wash cranberries.  Peel Orange/Tangerine.   In blender chop cranberries and orange/tangerine.  Remove from blender, add sugar and chopped pecans.   Place mixture in refrigerator for 1 hour.    Make cherry Jello as directed, and mix with cranberry mixture.   Place in refrigerator and allow to set.
